testcase.classname: Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "Samer" and last name "Sameh".....................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "tester12@example.com".................................passed And user enter company Name.................................................passed And user enter password and confirm password................................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user will be directed to registration page with message "Your registration completed".passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter email "tester@example.com" and password "123456789".........passed And user click on log in button.............................................passed Then user will be logged in successfully....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | user could switch between different currencies
testcase.name: user could move between currencies
testcase.system-out: When user select random currency............................................passed And currency is changed correctly...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed When user search with product name "apple" and press enter..................passed Then user could find valid results..........................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using sku
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed When user search with SKU "AP_MBP_13" and press enter.......................passed Then user could find valid results..........................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_hoverCategories | user could hover categories and select sub category
testcase.name: user could hover categories
testcase.system-out: When user hover category and select subcategory.............................passed Then user will directed successfully to subcategory page....................passed
